3: Well well, I am here at last.
The dismay you caused on your path here... Is a stain on this estate...
Mr. Butler, if you truly find this unforgivable, why didn't you step out earlier to stop me?
Protecting yourself, that is the very last order of your master, yes?
Just like Tifa in the beginning...
Humans, simple to a point. How boring.
Come out. Let me test your mettle. You might still be useful.
